trackCensoredName: Binaural Beats Alpha Waves – Relaxing Brainwaves with Soothing Music for Calming and Meditation
releaseNotes:
- Added a new feature to play songs in sequence. Now you can choose between looping one song only or cycle through the whole playlist
- General Improvements
description:
Looking for a way to relax? Binaural Beats Alpha Waves is the App for you! Have you ever heard about Alpha Waves before? Among all other isochronic tones, Alpha are associated with a state of deep relaxation and mindfulness meditation. They are emitted in an amplitude range between 8 and 15 Hz and are needed for reach a state of mindfulness and profound relaxation and for some types of biofeedback training.

They are excellent sounds to use during a meditation session, or when you simply need to chill your mind out. The use of headset or headphones is required to experience the effectiveness of the brainwave generator. The Binaural Beats Alpha Waves app allows you to do this, and lets you choose between 6 different binaural beats frequencies: 

7,5hz – Perfect Relaxation State
8,5hz – Enhance Focus Ability
9,5hz – Lucidity and Calmness
10,5hz – Promote Love Feelings
11,5hz – Calm Down
12,5hz – Fight Stress

Each frequency can be reproduced only one per time. To relax even more you can, however, add a background song to it from our selection, especially conceived for relaxation purposes. The first one is completely free, while the remaining others can be unlocked through in app purchase of the Premium extension: 

1 – Yoga Relaxation
2 – Spa and Dreams
3 – Massage Music
4 – Body to Body
5 – Close Your Eyes
6 – Meditative Relaxing Sounds
7 – Calmness Soundtrack
8 – Nature's Gift
9 – Peaceful Harmony
10 – Intense Consciousness

Finally, you can also unlock our Timer Feature which will help you even more during your relax or meditation sessions. 

May this app be a good aid for you to fight stress and provide you with countless hours of relaxation! Leave a review on how to make this app even better for you. For any suggestions, problems or requests, please contact us at support@rehegoo.com
trackName: Binaural Beats Alpha Waves – Relaxing Brainwaves with Soothing Music for Calming and Meditation
